intro: Polynome, commonly known as the common polynome, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its composite flower heads that consist of both ray and disk flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, nutrient-rich soils and is often found in wetlands and along stream banks. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers range in color from white to yellow. The plant plays an important role in supporting local pollinators and maintaining ecological balance in its habitat.
